title: Authenticating with Pluto
text: accessing data programmatically first time, ’ll need generate new API token. Navigate Account page Pluto click “+ API token” button. account_api_1 new API token generated, can copied viewed. account_api_2 API token can used fetch data programmatically using R package. respect permissions Pluto, can used access Projects Experiments permission view.

what: Option 1: Provide API token interactively / at run-time
title: Authenticating with Pluto
text: can “log ” Pluto interactively providing API token pluto_login helper function. save API key current environment can used subsequent API calls current session, simply provide API key: can also use save_Renviron = T save API key current environment save .Renviron file referenced future sessions. shortcut achieves outcome manual Option #2 described .
code: library(pluto)  pluto_login("<Your API key>") pluto_login("<Your API key>", save_Renviron = T)

what: Option 2: Use the PLUTO_API_TOKEN environment variable
title: Authenticating with Pluto
text: using Pluto one R projects, convenient save API token environment variable can easily referenced running scripts project. Copy API token created Account page store environment variable called PLUTO_API_TOKEN. , create .Renviron file containing: Save file, restart R session apply changes. confirm API token active R environment time, can run Sys.getenv("PLUTO_API_TOKEN").

what: pluto: Query and manipulate biological data stored in Pluto — pluto-package
title: pluto: Query and manipulate biological data stored in Pluto — pluto-package
text: Read assay data sample annotations stored Pluto, cloud-based platform biological data analysis visualization. Query raw processed data, well intermediate files results tables generated bioinformatics pipelines. Read https://pluto.bio.

title: Get sample or assay data tables from Pluto — pluto_get_experiment_data
text: experiment_id Pluto experiment ID table_type Table type, choices "sample" "assay" limit Integer max rows fetch, NULL fetch rows silent Boolean, whether suppress console messages paginated Boolean, whether make paginated request instead downloading whole table, default FALSE

title: Get sample or assay data tables from Pluto — pluto_get_experiment_data

Validate and store Pluto API token — pluto_login
text: api_key String, API token save_Renviron Boolean, save API token .Renviron silent Boolean, suppress login message

title: Validate and store Pluto API token — pluto_login
text: TRUE API key valid, otherwise returns error message.

title: Clear Pluto API token — pluto_logout
